channel.title: Requesting explanation of options in Black Mesa tab
channel.description:
I'd like to get an explanation of the various things in the Black Mesa tab of the options menu. Some things are self-explanitory, but some things aren't. In particular I'd like to get an explanation of the items in the performance and visuals categories.
Thank you to anyone who can answer.
